google-global-names-in-headers.description:
Description

Flag global namespace pollution in header files. Right now it only triggers on
using
declarations and directives.

The relevant style guide section is
https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Namespaces
.
google-global-names-in-headers.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
